long_description: Size is no excuse not to bring a tool along once you've got this mini workhorse in your arsenal. 18 functions squeezed into a 1.5 x 3.2 inch compact size. Features 2, 2.5, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8 and 10 Allen wrenches, Torx T25 bit for disc brakes, plus Phillips and flat-head screwdrivers. Also includes tire lever, chaintool and bottle opener. Comes with neoprene carrying case.
short_description: Size is no excuse not to bring a tool along once you've got this mini workhorse in your arsenal.
